summary: A giant alien spider escapes from a military lab and rampages the city of Los Angeles. When a massive military strike fails, it is up to a team of scientists and one clever exterminator to kill the creature before the city is destroyed.
cast: Greg Grunberg|Lin Shaye|Ruben Pla|Alexis Kendra|Lombardo Boyar|Bob Bledsoe|Eben Kostbar|Ray Wise|Clare Kramer|Patrick Bauchau|Kerry O'Quinn|Adam Gierasch|Bobby C. King|James Mathis III|Chaton Anderson|Shaked Berenson|Mary Czerwinski|Dana Davidson|Jennifer Gonzalez|Joseph Hui|Andrew Kasch|Lloyd Kaufman|Benjamin Michael Marsh|Sarah Oliver|Peter Podgursky|Blake Reigle|Shannon Robles|David Rosiak|Dylan Shmueli|Staci Layne Wilson
title: Big Ass Spider!
